name: enjaneb
author: Amirreza Ghafaei

sections.description:
enjaneb is an online chat service for web users with many features.
To use this plugin, you must register to enjaneb.com and enter your EPI in the plugin page.
More information : https://www.enjaneb.com/docs
Contact page : https://www.enjaneb.com/contact
website : https://www.enjaneb.com

اینجانب، ابزار پشتیبانی آنلاین و تماس با مشتریان
برای استفاده تنها کافی است بعد از عضویت و ثبت دامنه در وبسایت اینجانب، کد (ای پی آی) خود را در صفحه پلاگین وارد نمایید.
sections.installation:
to install the plugin use these steps.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Click on enjaneb link on the rightside menu to configure the plugin.
  4. Enter your EPI code from the page in the enjaneb admin panel (https://www.enjaneb.com/Panel)
  5. Save the settings then you can see enjaneb widget on your webpages.
  6. To change the language of the widget according to the WordPress language, activate the corresponding option.
  7. To install the widget on domains other than the domain registered in the enjaneb panel, please enter the origin domain box.
